RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the vehicles: RICARDO RODRIGUEZ, JR.'s vehicle and IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR.'s vehicle

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR.'s vehicle: Black Dodge pickup truck associated with IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR., stopped at the Freer Immigration Checkpoint, also referred to as "a black one", heading towards Highway 59 and then turning southbound onto Farm-to-Market Road 2050, with a camper, either dark blue or black in color
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.RICARDO RODRIGUEZ, JR.'s vehicle and IGN: Vehicles involved in the incident, including a white Malibu sedan and a black Dodge pickup truck, stopped near the Border Patrol Station Parking Lot, attempting to avoid the Hebbronville Checkpoint
